aima.core.robotics.impl.datatypes

Class Angle

  • java.lang.Object
    • aima.core.robotics.impl.datatypes.Angle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMclVector, java.lang.Comparable<Angle>

    public class Angle
extends java.lang.Object
implements IMclVector, java.lang.Comparable<Angle>
    This class stores an angle as a double. It is used to pass on the angle from the IMclRangeReading to the IPose2D.
    This implementation can be used for angles in radians. The context of this unit is that IPose2D has to use radian angles.
    Please note, that all classes that are interacting with the MCL somehow should use radian angles, too.
    Use degreeAngle(), getDegreeValue(), Math.toDegrees() and Math.toRadians() if you need or have degree angles.
    Author:
    Arno von Borries, Jan Phillip Kretzschmar, Andreas Walscheid
